text:
Stage I Rectal Cancer
                    		Treatment of stage I rectal cancer may include the following:         -  Local excision.    -  Resection.    -  Resection with radiation therapy and chemotherapy after surgery.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage I rectal cancer.
